org.purewidgets.client.feedback
Class CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Panel
              com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SimplePanel
                  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.PopupPanel
                      org.purewidgets.client.feedback.AbstractInputFeedbackPanel
                          org.purewidgets.client.feedback.CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasAttachHandlers, HasCloseHandlers<PopupPanel>, HasHandlers, EventListener, EventPreview, AcceptsOneWidget, HasAnimation, HasOneWidget, HasVisibility, HasWidgets, HasWidgets.ForIsWidget, IsWidget, SourcesPopupEvents, Iterable<Widget>, FeedbackDisplay
public class CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel
extends AbstractInputFeedbackPanel

The CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel displays input feedback to the user, accumulating various feedback messages if they occur within a limited amount of time. The panel can be configured with a maximum number of simultaneous feedback lines to display.

CSS Style Rules

.pwCumulativeInputFeedbackPanel
the outer element
.pwCumulativeInputFeedbackPanel .title
The Title of the panel (displayed for feedback for not visible widgets)
.pwCumulativeInputFeedbackPanel .accepted
the accepted input feedback element
.pwCumulativeInputFeedbackPanel .notaccepted
the not accepted input feedback element

Author:
Jorge C. S. Cardoso

Constructor Detail

CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel

public CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel(PdWidget widget)
Creates a new CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel for the specified PdWidget with default values for the maximum number of display lines.

Parameters:
widget - The PdWidget that is the target of the input that this panel is giving feedback about.

CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel

public CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel(PdWidget widget,
                                    int maxLines)
Creates a new CumulativeInputFeedbackPanel for the specified PDWidget, with the given number of maximum lines.

Parameters:
maxLines - The maximum number of simultaneous feedback lines.
widget - The PdWidget that is the target of the input that this panel is giving feedback about.
Method Detail

show

public void show(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> inputFeedback,
                 int duration)
Shows input feedback for the specified duration.

Parameters:
inputFeedback - The information about the feedback to display.
duration - The amount of time, in milliseconds, that the feedback should be visible.

hide

public void hide(InputFeedback<? extends PdWidget> feedback,
                 boolean noMore)
Hides the feedback. The panel is only actually hidden if there no more feedback to display, or if this panel only shows one line at a time.

Parameters:
feedback - The InputFeedback to hide.
noMore - Indicates if there is more feedback waiting to be displayed.

setNewOnTop

public void setNewOnTop(boolean newOnTop)
Sets new input feedback on top or on the bottom of the panel.

Parameters:
newOnTop - if true, sets new feedback on top of the panel; if false, sets new feedback on the bottom of the panel.

isNewOnTop

public boolean isNewOnTop()
Tests whether new feedback is displayed on top or on the bottom of the panel.

Returns:
true if the new feedback is displayed on top; false otherwise.

isShowTitles

public boolean isShowTitles()
Tests if this panel shows feedback using only one line per feedback message, or if it uses a title line and a description lines for the feedback.

Returns:
true if the panel shows titles and description lines; false if it shows only the description.

setShowTitles

public void setShowTitles(boolean showTitles)
Sets whether this panel should show titles and descriptions of just descriptions for the feedback.

Parameters:
showTitles - if true, this panel will show title and descriptions; if false it will show only descriptions.
